summary: This is an email chain from July 16, 2020, regarding scheduling a call for an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property. The participants are Marc A. Weinstein, a partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, and an external recipient, with Andrew Tomback copied. The email includes standard confidentiality disclaimers.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Partner, Chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: He is the sender of the email, organizing a call to discuss an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property. His email signature indicates his position at the law firm.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: He is copied on the email chain discussing the scheduling of a call about Epstein's NY property.

connections.description: Both are involved in a professional communication regarding an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property, with Tomback copied on the email.

events.title: Scheduled call on Epstein NY property
events.description: A call is scheduled for between 1:00 PM and 1:45 PM ET to provide an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property.

locations: One Battery Park Plaza, 17th floor, New York, NY 10004-1482
keyFacts: The email discusses scheduling a call for an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property in July 2020, after Epstein's death in 2019.
Marc A. Weinstein, a white-collar defense partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, is involved in matters related to Epstein's estate or assets.
The communication highlights ongoing legal or administrative activities concerning Epstein's assets posthumously.
